name: It All Started in a Bar Multiple Choice Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 1 | 20 Questions

questions.text: In the first episode "Show Me a Ring Sometime" who plays Sumner Sloan?
questions.explanation:
Michael McGuire.

	Ted Danson of course plays Sam Malone. Ron Frazier played Ron in this episode and John P. Navin played the boy.

questions.text: Sam has never been married.
questions.explanation:
False.

	In episode 2 we learn that Sam was married to Debra. Debra was played by Donna McKechnie.

questions.text: What baseball team does Ed Kellner like?
questions.explanation:
New York Yankees.

	Ed wanted Carla fired because when he insulted Sam and the Red Sox, Carla attacked him.

questions.text: Sam has an interview with Dave Richards for the "Whatever Happened To ..." series. Dave cancels at the last minute because he got a better interview with someone more famous than Sam. Who was the person he got an interview with?
questions.explanation:
John McEnroe.

	John McEnroe was a tennis player. Incidently, Wade Boggs and Kevin McHale have both been on the show. John McEnroe and Larry Bird have not been on, but they've both been mentioned.

questions.text: In "The Coach's Daughter", Lisa, Coach's daughter, is planning to marry a man. What is the man's name?
questions.explanation:
Roy.

	Lisa was played by Allyce Beasley.  Roy was played by Phillip Charles MacKenzie.

questions.text: Which regular on "Newhart" guest starred in season one of "Cheers"?
questions.explanation:
Julia Duffy.

	Julia Duffy played Diane's friend Rebecca who went out on a date with Sam.

questions.text: Who does Carla tell Diane the father of her son Gino is?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	She knows Diane can't keep a secret so she makes up this story knowing Diane will run and tell Sam. Nick is the actual father of Gino. Eddie is her second husband and the father of her last two children, the twins Jesse and Elvis. Bennet Ludlow is a friend of Frasier's who also got Carla pregnant in an episode. Carla's a rather fertile woman.

questions.text: In "Coach Returns to Action" what is the name of the woman that he is intersted in?
questions.explanation:
Nina.

	Nina was played by Murphy Cross.

questions.text: What does Sam carry with him for good luck?
questions.explanation:
bottle cap.

	Sam is an alcoholic. The bottle cap he carries is off the last drink he ever had.

questions.text: In "One For the Book" how many people, not counting Buzz Crawder himself, showed up for the 22nd Brigade's 60th reunion?
questions.explanation:
0.

	This is also the episode where Kevin wants to become a monk, however after drinkng he hits on Diane and decides he isn't ready to become a monk.

questions.text: In "Now Pitching, Sam Malone" Sam meets a commercial agent who helps sports starts get parts in commercials. What is the agent's name?
questions.explanation:
Lana.

	Lana was played by Barbra Babcock. Babcock later went on to play Dorothy on "Dr. Quinn, Medicine Woman."

questions.text: Diane had a cat named Emily Dickenson.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Diane's cat was named after a poet, but not Emily Dickenson. Her cat's name was Elizabeth Barrett Browning.

questions.text: Who is the father of Carla's fifth child?
questions.explanation:
Nick Tortelli.

	She convinces Marshall that he's the father because she wants someone who will be around to help, and Marshall is a responsible man. However, guilt overcomes Carla and we find out that the real father is Nick, her exhusband.

questions.text: In "The Boys in the Bar" Sam's friend from his baseball days, Tom Jackson, comes to the bar to promote a book. In it he reveals a secret he's kept all these years about himself, what is the secret?
options: He used to be a woman
questions.explanation:
He's gay.

	Everyone in the bar wants Sam to get rid of Tom for fear the bar will become a "Gay bar". Diane wants Sam to stand up for his friend. In the end, Sam does the right thing. Norm and Cliff end up making fools of themselves. Tom Jackson was played by Alan Autry.

questions.text: In "Diane's Perfect Date", Sam sets up Diane with a man who was in prison, why was he in prison?
questions.explanation:
Murder.

	Andy was played by Derek McGrath.

questions.text: Carla wins the "Boston Bar Maid" contest.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Diane wins the contest and plans to use the publicity to tell the world how degrading the contests are. However, when she learns about the grand prize she changes her mind and as she puts it "sells out".  Carla wasn't allowed to be in it becuase she was pregnent. In a different season she is in the contest, but loses to a blonde who's well built.

questions.text: In "Pick a Con... Any Con" who has an $8,000 gambling debt?
questions.explanation:
Coach & Ernie.

	Coach, or Ernie Pantuso in case you're wondering why I also put Ernie as a choice, got taken advantage of by George, played by Reid Shelton. Harry the Hat then comes in to help Coach out because Harry is a conartist himself. Harry is played by Harry Anderson who later played Harry Stone on "Night Court". Just a thought here but I wonder if Harry Anderson ever played a character not named Harry.

questions.text: Who is Diane's mother?
questions.explanation:
Helen.

	Helen Chambers was played by Glynis Johns. You might recognize her when you see this episode, she once played Mrs. Banks in "Mary Poppins".

questions.text: In "Show Down-Part I" Sam's brother comes to town. What is his name?
questions.explanation:
Derek.

	Derek is played by George Ball.

questions.text: The last episode of season 1 is "Show Down - Part 2". Diane is going to leave with Derek to go to Europe, but she wants to stay with Sam, and more so wants Sam to admit he wants her to stay. How does she get him to admit this?
questions.correct: Scratches her nails on a chalkboard
options: Gives him a lie detector test
questions.explanation:
Scratches her nails on a chalkboard.

	I left out two episodes from this season, but the other episodes are covered on this quiz. I hope you enjoyed it. Stay tuned soon for season 2.
